alert.note: Alert for Cottle; Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 4:56PM CDT until May 04 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Motley County in northwestern Texas... Central Cottle County in northwestern Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Paducah, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paducah and Swearingen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
